Class ServerAddress

java.lang.Object
it.uninsubria.controller.ServerAddress
public class ServerAddress extends Object
ServerAddress class for managing the RMI registry connection. This class provides a singleton instance of the RMI registry used by the client to communicate with the server. It initializes the connection to the RMI registry at a specified IP address and port.
